title: Control Group in Acid Rain Study

content.question: Which of the following would be the best control group to evaluate the treated wastewater from the paper company?

choices.label: A sample of water from a nearby river
A sample of water downstream from the same river
A sample of water upstream from the same river

content.answer: A sample of water upstream from the same river

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
